root: ^What the hell kid. I told you to take a look at the scene. Not shoot witnesses. They could take your badge for this. Hell they will tear me a new one for unleashing you.
^It was not intentional sir. The suspect posed a threat.
^You wanted me to take a look at the scene. I did. He got violent so I had to put him down.

1a: ^Okay kid. Nevermind. I'm sure we can explain in to the higher-ups somehow. Tell me what did you learn.
^Frankly sir I didn't find out anything.
^Damn it all happened so quick. He just started swinging.
^I do not know what to tell you.
1b: ^You didn't what? ... Who the hell are you kid, some kind of psycho? I am gonna report you to internal affairs. You can kiss your badge goodbye.
1c: ^Well it is too bad. I have to go write a report. Keep an eye on the scene and try not to shoot anyone okay?
